comment.author: 74784995@N00
comment._content: This seems to be the Pelletier d'Oisy Breguet 19 flight Paris-Tokyo 1924 which was completed in a borrowed Breguet 14 after a crash in Indo-china

comment.author: 72347661@N02
comment._content:
Correct
"Pivolo" and his mechanic Lucien Bésin in fact got as far as Shanghai where their Bre 19 No 3 crashed due to unprepared ground (a ditch or something...) on May 20th 1924. They borowed Bre 14A2 No 2097 and continued on May 29th.
Stig
